questions.question: If object M moves from point A to B, what would be its total displacement?
questions.explanation: Displacement is the straight-line distance from start to end point with direction. A to B is 80m East.

questions.question: If object M moves from point A to B and back to A, what would be the total distance covered?
questions.explanation: Distance is total path length: A→B (80m) + B→A (80m) = 160m

questions.question: If object M moves from A to C, and back to B, what would be the total distance covered?
questions.explanation: A→C (80+30=110m) + C→B (30m) = 140m total distance

questions.question: What is the displacement when object M moves from point B to point D?
questions.explanation: B→D is 30m + 45m = 75m in the West direction (assuming A→B is East)

questions.question: If object M completes a full trip A→B→C→D→C→B→A, what is the total distance traveled?
What is the displacement for a journey from point C to point A?
questions.explanation: C→A is 30m + 80m = 110m in the West direction

questions.question: If object M moves from A to D directly (straight line), what distance would it cover?
questions.explanation: A→D via straight path: 80m + 30m + 45m = 155m

questions.question: What is the displacement when object M moves from D to B?
questions.explanation: D→B is 45m + 30m = 75m in the East direction

questions.question: If object M moves from A to C at 2 m/s, how long does the journey take?
questions.explanation: Time = Distance/Speed = 110m ÷ 2 m/s = 55 seconds

questions.question: What is the total distance from point A to point D through point C?
If object M moves from B to D and back to B, what is the final displacement?
questions.explanation: Start and end at same point B, so displacement = 0

questions.question: What is the shortest distance between point A and point D?
questions.explanation: The path A→B→C→D is the only available route = 80+30+45=155m

questions.question: If object M moves from A to B in 10 seconds, what is its average speed?
questions.explanation: Average speed = Total distance/Time = 80m ÷ 10s = 8 m/s

questions.question: What is the displacement when moving from C to D?
questions.explanation: C→D is 45m in the West direction

questions.question: If object M moves from A to D and back to C, what is the total distance?
What is the displacement for a journey starting at B, going to D, then to C?
questions.explanation: B→D→C: Start B, end C, displacement = 30m West

questions.question: If object M takes 15 seconds to go from B to C, what is its velocity?
questions.explanation: Velocity = Displacement/Time = 30m West ÷ 15s = 2 m/s West

questions.question: What is the total distance for the path B→C→D→C→B?
If object M moves from A to D with an average speed of 5 m/s, what time is required?
questions.explanation: Time = Distance/Speed = 155m ÷ 5 m/s = 31 seconds

questions.question: What is the displacement when object M moves from A to B to C to D?
questions.explanation: A→B→C→D: Start A, end D, total displacement = 155m West

scoreMessages.90: Excellent! You have mastered distance and displacement concepts!
scoreMessages.70: Good work! You understand the basics but should practice more with direction.
scoreMessages.50: You're making progress! Focus on distinguishing distance vs displacement.
scoreMessages.0: Review the concepts: distance is total path length, displacement is straight-line from start to end with direction.
